name: uuh... it's just go kart racing
name_original: uuh... it's just go kart racing
description: Alright me and my brother made a racing game in 1 hour, and  it's multi-player,  to control the garbage truck  you use wasd to steer and space to push the other car, for the platypus car you use the arrows to steer and m to push the other car. Try to have fun, but you probably won't
